content: Identify the exact bug in main.py where extract_relevant_keywords return values are assigned incorrectly
Fix the variable assignment at line 1341 in main.py where keyword_col and feature_col are not properly captured
Fix the undefined variable issue at line 1668 where keyword_col_used and feature_col_used are used but not defined in that scope
Test the fix with the 姓名基本数 logic to ensure column references display correctly
